id.description: The unique identifier of the Team Invitation

team.description: The unique identifier of the team

sendBy.description: The unique identifier of the user who sent the invitation

sendTo.description: The unique identifier of the user who received the invitation

roles.description: Roles assigned to the user being invited

expiration.description: The timestamp or date string indicating when the invitation will expire

createdAt.description: The timestamp or date string indicating when the invitation was created

updatedAt.description: The timestamp or date string indicating when the invitation was last updated
